feup.lpoo.bounce.logic

Class BounceGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.Game
      • feup.lpoo.bounce.logic.BounceGame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationListener

    public class BounceGame
extends com.badlogic.gdx.Game
    Class that handles all the game logic. Created by Bernardo Belchior & Margarida Viterbo on 30-05-2016.
